name: American Flatbread
description: Lively choice for craft beer & inventive wood-fired pizzas loaded with organic, seasonal toppings.

name: Ben & Jerry's
description: Iconic Vermont-based ice cream parlor chain, known for its creative, cleverly named flavors.

name: Halvorson's
description: Family-run joint furnishing local beers & hearty comfort food in a cozy, wood-lined interior.

name: Hen of the Wood
description: Intimate eatery featuring daily menus of local, seasonal fare, craft cocktails & understated decor.

name: Henry's Diner
description: Diner with old-school style, serving all-American eats (including all-day breakfast) since 1925.

name: Nectar's
description: Landmark music hall featuring local music acts, craft beer & famed gravy fries, plus other pub grub.

name: New Moon Cafe
description: Stylish cafe featuring espresso drinks, baked goods, breakfast & lunch, plus a full vegan menu.

name: The Skinny Pancake
description: Local chain featuring breakfast, crepes, panini & live music in a casual, stylish space.
